name: AsciiCraft v0.1b
description:
Hi people!

AsciiCraft is just a prototype, not a game.

Further updates are coming.

Version History:
--------------------

v0.1b

  • Added Stone
  • Created Inventory, selecting items, dropping items
  • Added functionality for Placing,  Picking up,
    Looking at objects
  • Water flows into empty areas
  • Added waiting
  • Added resources Wood, Fruit
  • Updated the tileset

v0.1a

  • Random world generation
  • Basic interaction with the world
  • Switching graphics styles

What do you think so far?
